reactTrigger.expression:
GetEffectCount(GetInstigator(),$#30316002:6064631454318893954$) > 0
&&
GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) != GetReactionTypeId() 
&&
(GetRecordTypeId(GetHitSourceRecord(GetHitEvent())) != GetEffectTypeId())
&&
GetOwner() == GetInstigator() 
&&
(HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Element.Physical") || 
HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "Element.Magical")) 
&& 
!HitHasTag(GetHitEvent(), "ability.weaponcombo")
&&
(GetStatModValue(GetHitEvent(), $#10516612381411111:108986352686712$) < 0.0 ||
GetStatModValue(GetHitEvent(), $#10516612381411111:108986352686712$) > 0.0)
